thread.section_title: Power Home Technologies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Power Home Technologies | www.pht.com
thread.title: Amberlyn
thread.title_full: Power Home Technologies reviewed by Amberlyn

author: Amberlyn
title: Amberlyn
text: I am so thankful Henry came out and offered superior security. The Honeywell panel I had with ADT was far outdated. Thankfully, Henry saved the day. There is nothing better than feeling safe with the best technology. The app is user friendly and I love having access to my camera and system from my phone. I couldn't ask for a better experience.
